Name: Elements: Soul of Fire
About the game: The light of the world fades. Evil hearts seek the Power of the Elements - the forces which bind the universe together - thus threatening all of existence. Join an eclectic cast of characters and embark on a fantastic journey in the vast archipelago of Adamaria, evoking the gods of the land, sea, and sky in your quest to rekindle the fire of hope! Restore the light to the mystical Runes by earning the favor of the mighty Elemental Guardians and stand up to the oppressive forces of darkness. From the depths of the ocean to the highest skies and far, far beyond, your journey will take you to unimaginable places. Breathtaking action, mind-bending puzzles, and perilous traps await you in this epic 70-hour adventure. Come, awaken the power within YOU! Lose yourself in 'Elements: Soul of Fire!'
